report.name: $_title_0
report.styledef: font: bold True; alignment: horiz centre; borders: left 1, top 1, bottom 1, right 1;

sql.request: SET TIME ZONE 0; SELECT gateway_moneyorder.order_id AS "Id", gateway_moneyorder.card_four AS "Card", gateway_cardbrand.nominal AS "Brand", gateway_orderstatus.status_name AS "Status", gateway_currency.three AS "Currency", gateway_moneyorder.order_datetime::text AS "Date&Time", gateway_subaccount.nominal AS "Account", gateway_client.nominal AS "Client", gateway_country.two_letters AS "Client country", gateway_country.two_letters AS "Bank country" FROM public.gateway_moneyorder, public.gateway_cardbrand, public.gateway_orderstatus, public.gateway_currency, public.gateway_subaccount, public.gateway_client, public.gateway_country, public.gateway_country as bank_country WHERE gateway_moneyorder.card_type_id = gateway_cardbrand.code AND gateway_moneyorder.order_status_id = gateway_orderstatus.status_code AND gateway_moneyorder.currency_id = gateway_currency.code AND gateway_moneyorder.cust_account_id = gateway_subaccount.unikey AND gateway_moneyorder.client_country_id = gateway_country.country_code AND gateway_moneyorder.bank_country_id = bank_country.country_code AND gateway_subaccount.client_id = gateway_client.unikey AND gateway_moneyorder.order_datetime::date >= '$_parm_from_date' AND gateway_moneyorder.order_datetime::date <= '$_parm_to_date' AND (gateway_moneyorder.cust_account_id = $_parm_account OR $_parm_account = 0) AND (gateway_moneyorder.client_id_id = $_parm_client OR $_parm_client = 0) ORDER BY gateway_moneyorder.order_number DESC;
